Notice.title: Read, it's important!
Notice.welcome: We are delighted to welcome you. Here, excellence in financial services meets exclusivity for our most special guests.
Notice.accountOpening1: Opening an account with us is an exclusive privilege reserved for those who have received our coveted invitation code.
Notice.accountOpening2: If you are one of these privileged individuals, proceed to start the process and unlock access to the exclusive benefits awaiting you.
Notice.commitment: We are committed to providing personalized financial solutions designed to meet your individual needs with the utmost convenience and efficiency.
Notice.welcomeMessage: Welcome to our exclusive community. If you were invited, take the first step towards a new financial experience.

Code.inviteCodeInstruction: Enter the invitation code received in your email.

LimitExceeded.title: You have exceeded the number of attempts :(
LimitExceeded.message: You have exceeded the number of attempts and your account opening is blocked.
LimitExceeded.contact: Contact us through our communication channels and request a new invitation code.

Profession.politicallyExposed: Are you a politically exposed person?

Identification.goodLighting: Take the photo in a well-lit place.
Identification.clearPhoto: Ensure the photo is clear and captures the entire document without cuts.
Identification.adjustPoints: Use your fingers to adjust the four points to match the four corners of the document.

FrontalPhotoInfo.frontPhotoInstructions: Take a photo of the front of your document
FrontalPhotoInfo.removeFromPlastic: Remove the document from the plastic
FrontalPhotoInfo.checkFocus: Make sure the image is not out of focus
FrontalPhotoInfo.frontOnly: Take a photo only of the front of the document

BackPhotoInfo.backPhotoInstructions: Take a photo of the back of your document
BackPhotoInfo.removeFromPlastic: Remove the document from the plastic
BackPhotoInfo.backSideUp: Place the document back side up
BackPhotoInfo.checkFocus: Make sure the image is not out of focus
BackPhotoInfo.backOnly: Take a photo only of the back of the document

SelfieInfo.selfieInstructions: Take a selfie with your document
SelfieInfo.removeAccessories: Remove all accessories, such as hats and glasses, and show your face clearly
SelfieInfo.holdDocument: Hold the document with one hand
SelfieInfo.documentPosition: The document should be next to your face with the photo side facing forward

Document.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions

Loading.waitingMessage: Please wait on this screen while Atlo sends your data, okay? ;)

Congratulations.submissionMessage: Your data has been submitted for review.
Congratulations.approvalMessage: Once the account is approved, you will receive a welcome email informing you about the opening of your account.
Congratulations.waitingMessage: Please wait on this screen while Atlo sends your data, okay? ;)
